title: Hospital failings continued after Alice Figueiredo death, leaked documents show
description: Four months after a young woman died in a mental health unit, another patient tried to harm herself in similar circumstances, leaked documents show.
content:
Warning: This article contains upsetting details and references to serious self-harm and death

title: US Senate takes steps toward vote to end historic federal shutdown
description: Senators plan to vote on advancing House-passed stopgap funding bill, suggesting end to 40-day shutdown in reach
content:
The US Senate on Sunday moved toward a vote on reopening the federal government, suggesting that an end to the historic shutdown, now in its 40th day, is within reach.
Senators plan to vote on advancing a House-passed stopgap funding bill as early as... [4974 chars]

title: Do UN climate talks have a point any more?
description: The US president is notably absent from these UN climate talks, as are other world leaders, all of which prompts questions about the purpose of COP today.
content:
There is a photograph, taken ten years ago in Paris, that today seems like something of a relic.
In it, dozens of men and women line up in dark suits, in front of an enormous sign that reads COP21 Paris.
Right in the middle the UK's then-Prime Minist... [9843 chars]

title: China exempts Nexperia chips from export controls
description: The block on exports of the company's chips had raised fears that European car production would be hit.
content:
China has lifted export controls on computer chips vital to car production, the country's commerce ministry said on Sunday.
Exemptions have been granted to exports made by Chinese-owned Nexperia for civilian use, it said, which should help carmakers ... [2940 chars]

title: No link between paracetamol in pregnancy and autism or ADHD in children, review finds
description: Wide-ranging review finds no convincing connection after Trump said women should ‘fight like hell’ to avoid painkiller
content:
A wide-ranging review into paracetamol use by pregnant women has found no convincing link between the common painkiller and the chances of children being diagnosed with autism and ADHD.
Publication of the work was fast-tracked to provide prospective ... [4105 chars]
